en: Hey, #NAME. I decided to have a video call with you for this conversation, because it's important you understand what I'm saying.

I've noticed you've been a bit defensive with some of the criticism I've been offering. I understand that I can be a little bit harsh, but you need to be able to handle criticism without reacting in anger or retreating from your responsibilities.
This is something that's going to be affecting your work for the rest of your life. You can't hide from it. Please figure out how to handle it.
Thank you. I hope things will go more easily in the future.
Mhmm. Have I made my point? Please find a way to handle this. It's non-negotiable.
